repeat.name: knownAlleles
repeat.title: Input VCF file(s) with known indels

param.name: consensusDeterminationModel
param.label: minimum reads at a locus to enable using the entropy calculation
param.option: USE_READS - Additionally uses indels already present in the original alignments of the reads
KNOWNS_ONLYS - Uses only indels from a provided ROD of known indels
USE_SW - Additionally uses 'Smith-Waterman' to generate alternate consenses

param.name: LODThresholdForCleaning
param.label: LOD threshold above which the cleaner will clean

param.name: entropyThreshold
param.label: Percentage of mismatches at a locus to be considered having high entropy (0.0 < entropy <= 1.0)

param.name: maxConsensuses
param.label: Max alternate consensuses to try (necessary to improve performance in deep coverage)

param.name: maxIsizeForMovement
param.label: maximum insert size of read pairs that we attempt to realign

param.name: maxPositionalMoveAllowed
param.label: Maximum positional move in basepairs that a read can be adjusted during realignment

param.name: maxReadsForConsensuses
param.label: Max reads used for finding the alternate consensuses (necessary to improve performance in deep coverage)

param.name: maxReadsForRealignment
param.label: Max reads allowed at an interval for realignment

param.name: maxReadsInMemory
param.label: max reads allowed to be kept in memory at a time by the SAMFileWriter

param.name: noOriginalAlignmentTags
param.label: Don't output the original cigar or alignment start tags for each realigned read in the output bam
